page.title: 16A VISIT TO THE BYPASS.
page.content: On Wednesday 3rd July l985 we went to the bypass. We enjoyed our visit & thought it most interesting. We inter- viewed Mr. Colliver,the Chief Engineer & were most impressed by the trouble he took in answering our questions. Then we were shown around the Chapel end of the project.We went to the bridge that is going to be constucted over the Hayfield Road in Chapel Milton. The concrete supports are 4.5metres high taking the road up to the railway above Stodhart Farm.We saw where the Blackbrook has been culverted at Castleton Road after being channelled down a new cascade at the village of Blackbrook. The bull- dozers,excavators, trucks & cranes dwarfed us as they moved tonnes of earth quickly from place to place. We can't wait to see it when it is finished.
